description: Store the additional address information for a patient address.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the requisition record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_FIELD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of additional address data (floor, unit, building name, etc.) stored in the related field.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Street address


City


State


ZIP code


County


Country


House number


District


Building name


Floor


Unit

columns.name: ADDL_DATA
columns.description: The additional address data that applies to the additional address data type entered (floor, unit, building name, etc.).
